title: Growing curriculum partnership. Parts I-IV
creator_credit: Box Hill College of Technical and Further Education
brief_description: Current trends in Victorian schools call for increased participation and a sharing of resposibilities by parents, students and teachers. These programs are part of a series which set out to highlight certain aspects of this increased participation.
